name: Bean Boi (Sappels)
description:
Bean Boi is a game about beans collecting candy beans for the sake of all beans.

I will continue working on this together with my graphics artist Me.Artzz. Posting hoping it can gain some traction as we keep working on it.

Bean Boi started as a summer project that I then developed further during my graduation project period at Vocational school YRGO. Continuing development in my free time for both PC and an upcoming android release.

Playable with both Gamepad and Keyboard&Mouse.
